main event: Multiple witnesses at Blytheville AFB, Arkansas reported seeing 5 to 6 unidentified objects on radar and visually between 2315-2325Z on October 3, 1967.
interesting points: The initial observation was thought to be a helicopter before the object appeared to fade from view., The radar showed erratic movement at an estimated speed of 600-800 MPH moving due south., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds, with radar blips tracking the objects., Witness accounts included descriptions of suddenly accelerating movements and potential colors associated with the sightings., The reporting military personnel did not have any photographs or physical evidence to validate the sightings.
sighted object: five to six unidentified aerial objects
